Source.Name: libodfgen
Source.Summary: Library for generating documents in ODF
Source.Description: libodfgen is a library for generating documents in Open Document Format (ODF). It provides generator implementations for all document interfaces supported by librevenge: * text documents * vector drawings * presentations * spreadsheets
